remarks: Projection components on orthocomplemented subspaces are orthogonal. (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-1999.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjorth.1 $e |- A e. ~H $.
pjorth.2 $e |- B e. ~H $.
pjorthi $p |- ( H e. CH -> ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) .ih ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` B ) ) = 0 ) $.
